About Us

Our History

TM Ace Ltd. was formed on the hills of extensive research into the UK Traffic Management Industry, identifying gaps and challenges that needed to be addressed. With a commitment to safety, customer satisfaction, and the well-being of operatives, as we at TM Ace Ltd. believe that a well paid operative is a happy operative, we've become a leading provider of traffic management projects, staffing and training solutions.

We specialize in providing skilled traffic management personnel and comprehensive training programs to enhance the safety and efficiency of traffic management projects as well as the installation and de-installation of compliant temporary traffic management systems throughout the UK. We are committed to delivering tailored solutions to meet your specific staffing and training needs, whether for short-term projects or long-term positions.

FAQs

Frequently Asked Questions

Answers to common questions about our traffic management services, training, and operations.

What services does your traffic management company offer?
We offer road closures, lane shifts, temporary traffic signals, pedestrian management, event traffic control, and permit handling.
Are your staff qualified and accredited?
Yes. All our operatives are LANTRA or equivalent certified and trained in accordance with current traffic management regulations.
Do you provide emergency or 24/7 call-out services?
Absolutely. We provide round-the-clock traffic control services for emergencies and short-notice projects.
Can you assist with traffic management planning and permits?
Yes. We handle TMP (Traffic Management Plans), council approvals, and applications for permits.
How soon can I book your services?
We recommend booking at least 5 working days in advance, but we also accommodate last-minute and emergency requests whenever possible.
